belongs_to_collection.name: Icon Male's Forgive Me Father Series

overview: Gorgeous priest Father Anthony is assigned to replace Father Patrick in the Church of Holy Trinity. But like the fallen priest before him, Father Anthony soon finds himself struggling with forbidden desires while listening to his parishioner's sinful confessions. Are the tortured priest's sex-crazed dreams a premonition of his own doomed fate?
tagline: His sacred vows were no match for his sexual hunger
title: Forgive Me Father 4
